name: ESCAPE (itch) (isaac_sea)
description:
ESCAPE is a RUN’N’GUN in a RAT MAZE.

JONATHAN is a mouse forced to MURDER in the name of science. He must DODGE and BLAST his way out of the maze to ESCAPE. Gather CHEESE collect GUN upgrades, and uncover the TRUTH about his FAMILY.

ESCAPE is in BETA right now; FEEDBACK is welcomed.
